Text: can anyone confirm if this is legit
Downloaded this and found it's a crappy upsample that looks slightly worse than the original DVD. Please let this torrent die. Waste of bandwidth.

realdivers is just trying to kill the torrent.

This is NOT an upscaled version, it's definitely 1080p. Although I have to say the quality is not nearly as good as one would expect from this size.

Some filter has been applied, looks like a temporal smoother, which blurs out details. So far it's the only viable 1080p we have though... Hoping for something better, but it'll have to do for now.
